标题: Dickies Men's Skinny Straight-Fit Work Pant
详情: CLASSIC WORKWEAR: These lower-rise pants are crafted from a durable wrinkle-resistant poly/cotton twill work cloth w/ 1% Spandex for just the right amount of give. Spandex stretch fabric helps increase their durability for easy care stain resistant style.

标题: Dickies Men's Skinny Straight-Fit Work Pant
详情: DISTINCTIVE FIT: These pants provide comfort with a skinny straight fit that sits below the waist and is snug through the seat and thigh. They're designed with our classic 2-piece waistband with tunnel belt loops, plus a convenient extra pocket on the leg
